dmca.title: Theplanet.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Y2kRobie [mailto:y2krobie@hotmail.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 06, 2006 7:38 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Theplanet.com


Hello I am contacting you as when I looked at the Whois for this domain it
said you hosted them, anyhow Im hopeing you our the correct host for the
website breatheheavy.com and x-britney.com which is also domain name
xb-forum.com
They are posting Copywritten material on there site and in there forums, I
know they are a "Britney Spears" fan site and I think this should be looked
into at once as they our allowing vistors to download copywritten material
from there website this is illegal to post/host material that is Copywritten
especially that of a famous person such as "Britney Spears" herself.
 
Regards
Robbie
